import { useState } from "react"; function AdminProduct() { const [image, setImage] = useState(false); const [productDetails, setProductDetails] = useState({ name:"", image:"", category:"men", description:"", new_price:"", old_price:"", }) const imageHandler = (e) => { setImage(e.target.files[0]); } const changeHandler = (e) => { setProductDetails({ ...productDetails, [e.target.name]:e.target.value }) } const handleClick = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() } return (

Ajouter un produit

) } export default AdminProduct
